title: Drawing, 1917-4-130, ca. 1852–53
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right: island; and below third tree, at bottom: about 20 or 30 feet high; and again below the fourth tree, at bottom: dead leaves / brownish yellow.
description: Horizontal view of hilly and wooded bank of an island, at upper right and a leafy group of trees at upper as well as center left; with two tree tops and a tree across center right; and five designs of plants across bottom margin.
